remarks: A product is nonzero iff both its factors are nonzero.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2014.)
statement:
drngmuleq0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
drngmuleq0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
drngmuleq0.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
drngmuleq0.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. DivRing ) $.
drngmuleq0.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
drngmuleq0.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
drngmulne0 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X .x. Y ) =/= .0. <-> ( X =/= .0. /\ Y =/= .0. ) ) ) $.
